---

## Mode name

What would this mode be called?

## Target users

Who is this for? Game devs, designers, marketers, etc.

## Output types

What would this mode produce? (PNG sprites, SVG icons, HTML components, etc.)

## What makes it distinct

Why should this be a separate mode rather than a preset in an existing mode?

## Constraints and quality rules

What quality rules define a "good" output for this mode?
(e.g. must tile seamlessly, must be readable at 16px, must be print-ready)

## Export formats

What formats would this mode export? (PNG, SVG, GIF, ZIP, etc.)

## Prompt schema

What parameters would a user control? (size, style, category, etc.)

## Example prompts

Provide 2-3 example prompts that represent good use cases for this mode.
